name: GREED IS GOOD
description:
Join our official discord channel to get first-hand information about the game. We'll be updating more game content and listening to your suggestions!
https://discord.gg/CgB5hD5psD

Build your Adventure Team

GREED IS GOOD offers a variety of professions such as warriors and mages. Each role acquires unique skill points as well as combat techniques which can be combined at will to create your own adventure team. There are a variety of weapons for you to chooese, such as swords, daggers, bows, etc. You name it.

Dangerous Adventure

As a bounty hunter, your goal is to find precious treasures in the dungeon. Dangers lurk on every side in dark tunnels, such as skeletons, zombies, poisonous insects as well as an even more dangerous being: other bounty hunters. Opportunity and danger are both present; life and death are just a matter of chance. Find the rare portal and then you can survive.

Explore and Grow

Despite the dangers, many treasures lie in the dungeon. Along the way, you can find all sorts of weapons and equipment to enhance your combat attributes which give you an edge in battle. In addition, you can sell your weapons and equipment for more coins in the Trading House.

Cursed Dungeon

Sending bounty hunters deep into dungeons is not a whim. In the fall of 1417 A.D., the Emperor of Europas sent his army to the Darragon Desert. The soldiers explored the dungeon and brought back some mysterious treasures. However, the troop suffered heavy losses. Most of the surviving soldiers went into a frenzy within a week of returning home, screaming words like "monster", "nightmare" and "black mist". Even General Monk, who had been fighting on battlefields for many years, also died unexpectedly at home in the second month of his return.

And you, the bounty hunter, what fear are you going to encounter in the dungeon?
